translation.en: [woman over radio] Attention all units, attention all units.

[newsman] From the Great Pyramid of Giza to the Tower of Babel,

you can fix a problem by turning it off and on again.

but you don't want to do this.

I need you to tell me what happened, okay?
All right? I can help you if you tell me what happened.
They weren't supposed to go back, Will.
They weren't supposed to be there.

translation.en: Light a man's house on fire

I don't know. Let me go check.

- 방화 시스템 작동 중 - 거기들 있어

translation.en: The building isn't on fire. The 96th floor is on fire.
We're more than a hundred stories above that,

We're perfectly safe here, I assure you.
They're coming, Will. They're gonna kill you.

FBI for six years, Hostage Rescue for eight.

translation.ko: 윌 소여는 안전 자문관으로 고용돼 보안 프로토콜 접근권이 있었어요

translation.en: He had access to the security protocols.
Maybe he shut down the anti-fire measures.
Do me a favor, go find Will Sawyer.
I'd like to ask him some questions.
I want to talk to him.
What the hell is he doing?
He's climbing above the fire line.
Sir, I can't protect you if you don't tell me what's going on.
translation.ko: 회장님 무슨 일인지 얘길 안 해주시면 제가 지켜드릴 수가 없습니다

translation.en: This isn't just a fire. It's a plot.
-I can't say for sure. -I don't need facts.
What is your gut telling you? Who's behind this?
If a man like Botha wanted you dead, there are easier ways.
translation.ko: 회장님을 해치려면 쉬운 방법도 있을 텐데요

translation.en: [scoffs] He doesn't want me dead. At least not yet.
translation.ko: 날 죽이려는 게 아니야 적어도 아직은...

translation.en: And lighting The Pearl on fire is the only way he can get it.
translation.ko: 펄에 불을 내야 이걸 뺏을 수 있거든

translation.en: Is there something I should know?
[in Cantonese] Why would anyone want to get into a burning building?
translation.ko: 왜 굳이 불길 속으로 들어가는 거죠?

translation.en: [in Cantonese] Inspector... We have a last known location
translation.ko: 반장님 윌 소여 가족의 최종 소재가 확인됐답니다
윌 소여 가족의 최종 소재가 확인됐답니다

translation.en: You're doing great. Wait, hold on. Come here.
translation.ko: 정말 잘하고 있어 잠깐만, 이리 와

translation.en: -Baby, we're gonna wet these again, okay? -Okay, Mommy.
Okay, baby. Calm down. Calm down.
That's the bridge to the waterfall. We'll keep heading up.
Come on. Up the stairs. Okay.
I see you met my associate.
Why don't you just shoot me and take it?
You know I can't do that.
translation.ko: 난 널 못 쏴 물건 못 가져가도

translation.en: 'Cause the men I work for will kill me
translation.ko: 난 널 못 쏴 물건 못 가져가도 대장 손에 죽을 거고

translation.en: if I don't get it back for them.
You should've paid me and been done with it. But no.
translation.ko: 나한테 돈 줬으면 좋았잖아 그거 알아?

translation.en: Clever boys like you always think you can be clever.
translation.ko: 넌 네가 항상 똑똑한 줄 알지만

translation.en: I'm gonna take you and your drive
translation.ko: 난 널 데려갈 거야 네 드라이브와

translation.en: And I'm going to make you watch as your building burns to ash
translation.ko: 네 건물이 재가 되는 걸 실컷 구경하게 해줄게

translation.en: and there's nothing you can do about it.
translation.ko: 네가 할 수 있는 건 없어

translation.en: He sealed himself in the penthouse. Open the doors.
The penthouse floor has its own subroutine.
Zhao must have isolated that system.
translation.ko: 쟈오가 시스템을 차단했나 봐요 "펜트하우스 접속 불가"

translation.en: I can't open the doors with this tablet.
Wait. It looks like Will Sawyer's in the building.
translation.ko: 잠깐만요 윌 소여가 건물 안에 있나 봐요

translation.en: And I've got a movement alert.
You're not gonna get in using force.
You need someone who knows the system.
And I know just the man for the job.
If anyone can get in, it's him.
He's in the building. Just need to find him.
translation.ko: 건물 안에 있으니 찾기만 하면 돼

translation.en: We don't need to find him.
If you can't fix it with duct tape...
Then you ain't using enough duct tape.
All right, you were on the 98th floor, east side stairwell.
Means you would've had to go through the park.
-Stay with me, baby. Okay? Okay. -[Henry coughing]
I got them. They're in the park.
-Kids, too. -[Sarah] Do what he says. Okay?
That's right. Listen to your mummy.
[Sarah] It's okay, guys. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 괜찮아 아무 일 없을 거야

translation.en: Just do exactly what I say.
Just have to go up a little bit farther.
Keep going. Go all the way up to the waterfall.
I'll go around to the other side.

translation.ko: 난 반대편으로 갈게 위에서 봐 알았어

translation.en: [Mr. Pierce] I'm not supposed to kill you,
but I think your kids will be enough.
How did you get in the building?
It's a long story. Where are the kids?
-Mom! Dad! -[Sarah] Oh, God, are you okay?
She's at the top of the park by the waterfall.
Honey, stay right there. -Daddy's coming for you. -Okay.
-How do we get across the bridge? -[coughing]
-All right, we got to do this together. -Okay.
When I tell you to, walk it out, drop it, and go get him, okay?
translation.ko: 내가 가라고 하면 이걸 내리고 앨 데려와

translation.en: I'm gonna hold the bridge steady.
Oh, I got you. I got you.
-Okay. As still as you can. -[board creaking]
[straining] You can do it. You can do it.
I can't hold it anymore! Jump!
Come on. Will, what the hell is going on?
I don't know, but I got to get you guys out of this building.
translation.ko: 몰라, 일단 나가자 얘가 숨을 못 쉬네

translation.en: All right, these elevators operate on electromagnetic induction.
they're held in place by a fail-safe brake.
When I cut this cable, you're gonna fall.
translation.ko: 내가 이걸 자를 테니까 당신은 내려가

translation.en: Just listen to me. You're gonna fall through the fire.
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들어 불길을 뚫고 내려가다가

translation.en: The magnets are gonna kick back on
once you pass the fire line.
But I need you to pull this handle in order to engage the braking system.
translation.ko: 그때 이걸 당겨서 제어 장치를 작동시켜야 해

translation.en: It's about 500 feet from here until the fire line.
I want you to count to five and pull the handle.
In order to be brave, we got to be a little scared.
All right? Now, I need you to be brave right now.
translation.ko: 지금은 용감해져야 해 할 수 있지?
지금은 용감해져야 해 할 수 있지? - 네 - 엄마 꽉 붙잡아라

translation.en: I want you to hold on to your mom.
Okay, baby. We're gonna sit down.
We're gonna brace ourselves, all right? Okay.
Just the man I was looking for.
I hear your dad knows everything about this building.
translation.ko: 네 아빠가 이 건물에 대해 빠삭하다며?

translation.en: [Botha] All I care about is what my business partner is holding behind those doors.
translation.ko: 내 동업자가 저 안에 감춰둔 걸 찾아서

translation.en: And you're going to get it for me.
The only way those doors open is from the inside,
or the fire alarm on this floor triggers it,
but that can't happen because you took the entire system offline.
translation.ko: 네가 시스템을 꺼서 경보도 안 울려

translation.en: [Botha] Is that so? Well, let me tell you something.
Once you know what he loves, you have it.
So now we're going to find out how much you love your family, Will.
translation.ko: 이제 확인해보자고 네가 가족을 얼마나 사랑하는지

translation.en: Listen to me. Opening those doors from this floor can't be done.
translation.ko: 이 층에서 저 문을 여는 건 불가능해

translation.en: You're gonna bring Zhao and what he's holding behind those doors to me.
translation.ko: 쟈오와 놈이 숨겨둔 걸 가져오지 않으면

translation.en: Or I'm gonna throw your daughter off the fucking roof.
I hear it's like heaven up there.
-No, no, no! Daddy! No! -No. Georgia! Georgia! No!
[Botha] Straight to the roof, boys. We're not gonna wait around here to burn.
translation.ko: 옥상으로 가자 여기서 타 죽을 순 없잖아

translation.en: [newsman over TV] ...into the destruction of Zhao Long Ji's Pearl tower.
translation.ko: 쟈오 롱 지의 펄 타워가 붕괴하고 있군요

translation.en: We're getting reports of activity on the ground floor of the building.
We're going to go live to Kowloon Plaza, where we may have some survivors
It's difficult to imagine how anyone could have survived
the raging fire on the upper floors.
[Henry] My dad's inside. He saved us.
-He's still inside. -[reporter] Is there any other news?
[newsman] It appears this may be the family of William Sawyer, the American security consultant...
translation.ko: 미국인 안전 자문관 윌 소여의 가족 같네요

translation.en: There's got to be a way to open these doors.
translation.ko: 문을 열 방법이 분명히 있을 텐데

translation.en: Where did you put the subroutine panels that controls them?
Where did you hide it, Zhao?
How did you get out of the building? Can you comment?
[Sergeant Han] And you claim your husband isn't involved?
It's not a claim. He's not involved.
How many of them did you say you saw?
One in a suit, two others in coveralls.
translation.ko: 한 명은 정장이었고 둘은 작업복을 입었어요

translation.en: The one that I spoke to, he had an accent.
There. Top row. Second from the right.
translation.ko: 저기 윗줄에 있네요 오른쪽에서 두 번째요

translation.en: Is this the man you saw?
Has a nasty crew with him, too.
High-end muscle for three different crime syndicates.
translation.ko: 범죄 조직 세 군데에 고용된 청부업자죠

translation.en: This doesn't pass the smell test.
Why would he trap himself in the fire?
And why would he cut off his only way out?
One of them was carrying a container,
and it had a logo with wings on it, and the word "Sirin."
A BASE jump from 1,000 meters up gives you roughly
they will land somewhere within this circle.
translation.ko: 이 정도 반경 안에 착륙할 겁니다

translation.en: Now, they wouldn't go for Victoria Park. There's too many trees to get hung up on.
translation.ko: 빅토리아 공원은 나무가 많으니까 안 될 거고

translation.en: South, they wouldn't clear the peak.
but it's a longer haul to an open spot.
That's nothing. It's a construction site.
You can't seriously be considering this.
For all we know, she could be in on it.
You think I would willingly trap my own children in a burning building?
[in English] I think you could be playing a role.
This could all be part of your husband's plan.
translation.ko: 다 당신 남편의 계획일 수도 있죠

translation.en: If I am wrong and it's empty, then what have you lost?
But if I am right, this might be your only chance
translation.ko: 내 말이 맞으면 이 일의 범인을 잡을 기회를 놓치게 돼요

translation.en: to catch the people responsible for this whole thing.
translation.ko: 이 일의 범인을 잡을 기회를 놓치게 돼요

translation.en: Just cut the wire, doors will open, climb back up there.
translation.ko: 와이어를 자른 뒤 문 열고 올라가면 돼

translation.en: Does that look like someone with a plan to you?
All right, if we're gonna get out of here, you're gonna have to tell me the truth.
How does a man like that call you his business partner?
He handles extortion for three powerful crime syndicates.
translation.ko: 세 군데 조직에 고용된 갈취 전문범이에요

translation.en: And when I began construction on The Pearl, Botha came to me.
translation.ko: 펄을 짓기 시작할 때 날 찾아왔죠

translation.en: He said that if I didn't pay him, he'll cripple my labor force
translation.ko: 돈을 안 주면 인부들 고용을 방해하고

translation.en: and keep me from ever completing this place.
But what he didn't know was that I hid tracking software inside my wire transfer.
translation.ko: 근데 송금할 때 추적용 소프트웨어를 깔아놨어요

translation.en: I was able to trace every transaction,

translation.ko: "해독" 놈들의 계좌, 이름 신원을 다 파악했어요
놈들의 계좌, 이름 신원을 다 파악했어요

translation.en: Botha would never be able to extort money from me again.
translation.ko: 내게서 다시는 돈을 못 빼앗게 됐고

translation.en: But when the syndicates found out that they were compromised,
translation.ko: 정보가 누설된 걸 안 조직은 "전송 완료"

translation.en: they threatened to destroy Botha if he didn't clean up his mess.
translation.ko: 해결 안 하면 죽이겠다고 보타를 위협했어요

translation.en: If he kills me, the copies I've made will be sent to the authorities.
translation.ko: 놈이 날 죽이면 사본이 사법 당국에 전달돼요

translation.en: But if he gets his hands on this, the original,
he can reverse engineer my tracking software
and hide the identities before anyone's the wiser.
translation.ko: 자신들의 신원을 감쪽같이 숨길 수 있죠

translation.en: So, he lit this entire building on fire
knowing that you would take the most valuable thing in this world to you and run.
translation.ko: 제일 중요한 걸 들고 피할 거로 생각했군요

translation.en: -And his plan worked. -Not yet, it hasn't.
We're gonna give Botha what he came here for.
As soon as he has the drive, he'll kill us both.
translation.ko: 드라이브를 손에 넣으면 우릴 죽일 거요

translation.en: But he has my daughter. And her life is what matters to me, not mine.
translation.ko: 하지만 내 목숨보다 딸아이 목숨이 더 중요해요

translation.en: Now, I'm taking that drive to the roof.
You could either be attached to it or not.
I knew you'd find a way.

translation.ko: 쟈오도 같이! 안 돼 내 딸부터 놔줘

translation.en: -I can't let you do this. -Hey, what are you doing?
-This is not in the plan. -Turn around.
He's got my daughter. Please, don't do this to me.
-A parachute or you get nothing! -Give him your parachute.
translation.ko: 낙하산 주든가 다 포기하든가! 네 거 줘

translation.en: [Inspector Wu] It looks like you were right.
We've got armed suspects up ahead.
Stay down, don't leave the car.
Thanks. You almost had me convinced out there.
You shoot me, I drop this
translation.ko: 날 쏘면 이걸 던질 거야 얘도!

translation.en: But there's one thing you should know first.
translation.ko: 근데 네가 모르는 게 하나 있어

translation.en: [sighs heavily] I got you. I got you. I got you.
I don't know, she had it on her.
It looks like it controls the building.
Hey, let's wait for someone who knows what they're doing.
My husband and daughter are in that building, it's on fire right now. I'm not gonna wait another damn second.
translation.ko: 남편과 딸이 불길 속에 있어요 1초도 더 못 기다려요

translation.en: Come here. Stay down, stay low. I'm gonna find us a way out of here.
translation.ko: 바싹 엎드려 있어 나가는 길을 찾아볼게

translation.en: I'm trying to bring the fire systems back online.
[panting] Daddy's got you. Daddy's got you.
I got you. Look at me. Look at me.
Daddy loves you. Daddy loves you.
How the hell did you do that?
I rebooted the control systems for the entire building.
translation.ko: 건물 전체의 제어 시스템을 재부팅 했어요

translation.en: I turned it off and on again.
What are you gonna do now?
You okay? You okay? Are you hurt?
You've got quite a family there.
